original_text: And there were seven steps leading up to it, and its vestibule was before them, and it had palm trees on its jambs, one on either side.
korean_text: 또 그리로 올라가는 일곱 층계가 있고 그 안에 현관이 있으며 또 이쪽 저쪽 문 벽 위에 종려나무를 새겼으며

sentences.original_text: And there were seven steps leading up to it
and its vestibule was before them
and it had palm trees on its jambs
